Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: VixenRose
Reviews.Content: I've only had the laptop for a few weeks. I am extremely happy with it so far. I really wish I had stayed w/ Toshiba when I bought the previous laptop, b/c I've had nothing but good luck w/ my Toshiba laptops (this is my 3rd in 10years).I did NOT like windows 8, at first - mainly b/c it's unfamiliar. I'm already starting to get used to the features & where everything is located. So far I'm still able to use all the same applications that I've been using for years, so I'm good...I would recommend this product!! & any Toshiba laptop, for that matter!

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: its very fast, the battery life is roughly 2-4 hrs which isn't bad. The only problem that I have had is windows 8, its not computer friendly until you  change all of the settings to be more like XP or windows 7. Windows 8 is also overly susceptible to viruses and Trojans (Microsoft made another version of VISTA and they called it windows 8).

Reviews.Title: Terrible product and even worse customer service
Reviews.Author: Allen Gray
Reviews.Content: We have purchased four Toshiba products and have eventually had problems with EVERY ONE OF THEM.  To make matters worse, their customer service is outright horrible.  They don't want to resolve issues, they just want to get you off the phone.  If you like turning blue in the face and have your blood pressure spike to near stroke levels then buy this product!

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: g
Reviews.Content: This laptop is flimsy, under powered, has a very uncomfortable and unresponsive touchpad, comes with a TON of bloatware and runs windows 8....

Reviews.Title: Problem Loading MS Office
Reviews.Author: Jeff Whittaker
Reviews.Content: Open office would not install.  MS Office would not install.  Not good.  I suspect MS has designed the operating system to repel Open office.

6GB DDR3 1600MHz memory, Memory Card Reader
640GB HDD (5400rpm, Serial ATA), DVD-SuperMulti drive (+/-R double layer)
15.6" widescreen HD TruBrite® LED Backlit display, 1366x768 (HD), 16:9 aspect ratio, Supports 720p content
HD Webcam and Microphone, HDMI, RGB port, Wi-Fi® Wireless networking (802.11b/g/n), Up to 4.0 hours battery life
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite C855D-S5135NR 16-Inch Laptop AMD A6-4400M Processor, 6GB Ram, 640GB Hard Drive, Windows 8 (Fusion Finish in Mercury Silver)
